channel.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
channel.description:
Well i decided to host my server for a pretty long time so i was wondering howmuch my players my Internet could hold, and if i would get lagg.
[URL=http://www.speedtest.net][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/655573537.png[/img][/URL]
[img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/2491/nigg.png[/img]

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I think mine is decent over a long distance.

Read full topic
item.source: Howmuch players would my server take?

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:11, topic:320178”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=416629.msg3063999#msg3063999 date=1261084987]
Your computer will hold far more players than your upstream bandwidth (42kbps) will allow anyway. I doubt 1 or 2 players could be on your internet connection at once.
[/quote]
420kbps* which is about 53KBps

Primadude, a ping taken from speedtest is rather useless since you normally choose a server closest to yourself. In real conditions players are much further away.[/quote]

I know.

Read full topic
item.source: Howmuch players would my server take?

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Your computer will hold far more players than your upstream bandwidth (42kbps) will allow anyway. I doubt 1 or 2 players could be on your internet connection at once.

420kbps* which is about 53KBps

Primadude, a ping taken from speedtest is rather useless since you normally choose a server closest to yourself. In real conditions players are much further away.

Read full topic
item.source: Howmuch players would my server take?

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

The connection just shows much the ping would be from the hoster to the players. For example, if the hoster had a very good internet connection, the server would take less time to respond to the packets via the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Howmuch players would my server take?

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:


A few minutes later.

How much would mine hold?

I have:

4gb Ram 230 HD Wireless connection :D Windows xp media 5.1 and that's all I am going to say

Read full topic
item.source: Howmuch players would my server take?

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Deathspirit, post:6, topic:320178”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=416629.msg3063999#msg3063999 date=1261084987]
Your computer will hold far more players than your upstream bandwidth (42kbps) will allow anyway. I doubt 1 or 2 players could be on your internet connection at once.
[/quote]Sounds hard to understand to me, what exacly do you mean with; “I doubt 1 or 2 players could be on your internet connection at once” do you mean it’s not possible at all?[/quote]

I’m saying that no matter how fast your computer is, I doubt your connection would support much more than one or two players.

Read full topic
item.source: Howmuch players would my server take?

item.title: Howmuch players would my server take?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Your computer will hold far more players than your upstream bandwidth (42kbps) will allow anyway. I doubt 1 or 2 players could be on your internet connection at once.

I had 20 on my server and my upstream is the same as his.

Read full topic
